page.title: 13St.Clement's Hospital
page.content:
St.Clement's provides the districts psychiatric service(except for 20 beds at Whitechapel).There are 145 beds for in patients,with plans to increase this to 157 by 1988.Although there is an out patients department,no facilities exist for a day hospital.This is a serious shortfall in district services.New facilities for the occupational therapy department are to be based in a former supplies building.Although various physical improvements are being made, St.Clement's is under threat of closure Despite the pressure on its services, because it is a small hospital,the fear is that it will eventually be absorbed into another hospital,probably Mile End
Fiona Cullen(11)
